biotools.summary: ArrowSAM is an in-memory Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) representation which uses Apache Arrow framework (A cross-language development platform for in-memory data) and Plasma (Shared-Memory) Object Store to store and process SAM columnar data in-memory.

bioschemas.name: ArrowSAM
bioschemas.summary: ArrowSAM is an in-memory Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) representation which uses Apache Arrow framework (A cross-language development platform for in-memory data) and Plasma (Shared-Memory) Object Store to store and process SAM columnar data in-memory.
